about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, Pune based Kranti Industries Limited is a company engaged in the business of manufacturing and supplying of precision machined components. The company is primarily known for a range of automotive component and non-automotive (off highway) components.

The company manufactures different types of automotive components varying from 100 MM to 1200 MM in size. It also manufactures customized products for reputed Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) of diverse industries such as passenger cars, electric cars, two-wheelers, light vehicles, tractors, construction machinery, off-highway, heavy trucks and railways etc.

Over the years Kranti Industries has diversified its product portfolio. It currently caters to various sectors by developing components for automobile, commercial vehicle, construction, pneumatic tool, windmill, medical industry, etc.

The company's client base includes Graziano Transmission India Pvt. Ltd, John Deere India Pvt. Ltd, CNH Industrial (India) Private Limited formerly known as (New Holland Fiat (I) Pvt. Ltd), Carraro India Pvt. Ltd, Jaya Hind Industries Limited, Endurance Technologies limited, Neosym Industry Limited (Sanaswadi) and Meltwel Scrap Traders, etc.

The company has two manufacturing facilities located at Pune, Maharashtra.

The current Order Book of the company, as on November 30, 2018, is approximately Rs 660.34 Lacs.

The company has 155 employees (including temporary workers) on its payroll.

Competitive Strengths:

1. More than 20 years of experience
2. Stable customer base with 10 largest customers accounting for around 96% of total domestic sales
3. Diverse product portfolio catering to different market needs
4. Well established manufacturing facilities located at automotive hub

faqs.question: What is the Kranti Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Kranti Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 2319000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.58 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹37 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on February 14, 2019, and closes on February 20, 2019.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Kranti Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Kranti Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Kranti Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Kranti Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Kranti Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Kranti Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Kranti Industries IPO opens on February 14, 2019 and closes on February 20, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Kranti Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Kranti Industries IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,11,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Kranti Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Kranti Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
